body:
https://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=news_item&px=Git-2018-Security-CVE-2018

we should probably add the other updates too, but I had a hard time getting the correct checksums. `git` itself advises `sha256` sums, but these are not consistent with what I'm getting when I manually checksum `2.17.1` https://mirrors.edge.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/sha256sums.asc

I'll probably get back to this at the end of the week
title: add 2.17.1 for git
